translation.title: Scientists
translation.description-home: Summarizing everything we do on a website can be challenging. We invite you to tell us about your project.
translation.description-home2: Our team will meet with you to jointly assess how we can assist you. We can meet via video call, over coffee, or at our offices at Calle Real 24, Planta 1ª, 15003, A Coruña.
translation.description-newsletter: Subscribe! We promise not to send too many emails, only with information of interest such as specific offers, financing, and more…
